channel.title: WSTG-V42-APIT-01 on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in WSTG-V42-APIT-01 on ZAP

item.title: GraphQL Circular Type Reference
item.description: A circular reference was detected in the GraphQL schema, where object types reference each other in a cycle. This can be exploited by attackers to craft deeply recursive queries, potentially leading to Denial of Service (DoS) conditions.
